text: whdha alquran kitab 'anzalnah 'iilayk -ayha alrswl- eazim alnfe, musadiq lima taqadumah min alkutub alsmawyt, 'anzalnah lnkhwwif bih min eadhab allah wbash 'ahl "mk" waman hawlaha min 'ahl 'aqtar al'ard klha. waladhin yusadiqun bialhayat alakhrt, yusadiqun bi'ana alquran kalam allh, wyhafzwn ealaa 'iqam alsalat fi awqatha
